first_tick_commands: execute if entity @e[tag=sentinel.test,distance=0..30] run tag @s add give.sentinel.one
execute as @e[tag=sentinel.test] if score @s grave.ID = @p grave.ID run function satsu_iron_man_addon:ia/swap_sentinels
execute as @e[tag=sentinel.test] if score @s grave.ID = @p grave.ID run kill @s

conditions.command: execute if entity @e[tag=sentinel,sort=nearest,distance=2..] if score @s grave.ID = @e[tag=sentinel,limit=1,sort=nearest] grave.ID
execute if entity @e[tag=sentinel,sort=nearest,distance=2..] if score @s grave.ID = @e[tag=sentinel,limit=1,sort=nearest] grave.ID

last_tick_commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.addon.energy.ia.unlock.icon.in.hud=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.addon.energy.ia.unlock.icon.in.hud

commands: execute as @s[scores={satsu.iron.man.addon.enable.sentinel=2..}] run scoreboard players reset @s satsu.iron.man.addon.enable.sentinel
